title: A gentle reflection on the modest account, and a vindication of the loyal abhorrers from the calumnies of a factious pen by the author of the Parallel.
author: Northleigh, John, 1657-1705.
publisher: Printed for Benj. Tooke ... and Tho. Sawbridge ...,
notes: An attack on the Earl of Shaftesbury.
Attributed to John Northleigh. Also widely but erroneously attributed to John Andrews, who also wrote a work called The parallel (1735). Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
